data.name: Youtube Dracula - Dark Theme
data.description:
Youtube Theme based on Dracula Theme
**you need to enable dark mode in youtube settings**

data.name: Simple Animated Chat
JavaDarks [Alpha]
data.description:
Basically a dark mode for Javadocs.
Don't expect this to work very well yet, it's still in heavy development.
Made by Riedler, licensed under Creative Commons BY-SA 4.0.
Basically, you can redistribute and 'remix' this as long as you mention me as the original creator.

data.name: airbnb dark mode
Wavecrest (tumblr cursor)
data.description:
*for personal use*
Though, if you like it and want to use it on your tumblr dash, you are more than welcome to of course.

data.name: Bright Purple Bowtie ➺ (cursor for dashboards)
data.description: Bright purple bow cursor with white polka dot pattern for tumblr dashboards

data.name: Old Discord Colors [V1.0.1]
data.description: Don't like the colors of the Discord redesign? Then you're in luck! This style changes those green buttons and dark search bars back to the old colors.

user.name: Lekrkoekj

Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.
